content.text:
[@Powersource too](@JifG9OFC1cUWHCI+126iOZeqevvgF5nwrNiNXcHohYM=.ed25519) 

Could you check and see if you can reproduce the crash with `container.toString()` without any `console.log`? I think the logger calls `container.prototype.toString()` when you log it so I'm curious whether it's the type conversion or an issue with stdout.
